scenes.description: Instrumental introduction with Takanashi Kiara dancing on stage.
MC section where Kiara talks to the audience about the performance.

subtitles.original:
HINOTORI
Takanashi Kiara
subtitles.english:
HINOTORI
Takanashi Kiara

subtitles.original: 瞬く星の揺りかご
subtitles.english: The twinkling stars' cradle

subtitles.original: 欠けた台詞を繋ぎ合わせたメモリー
subtitles.english: Memories of piecing together broken words

subtitles.original: 聖なる注釈が伝う神話のことわり
subtitles.english: The sacred annotations follow the logic of myth

subtitles.original: 祈りに耳を澄ませ
subtitles.english: Listen closely to the prayers

subtitles.original: Tell me, I can hear it clearly
subtitles.english: Tell me, I can hear it clearly

subtitles.original: Tell me, 声が聞こえる
subtitles.english: Tell me, I hear your voice

subtitles.original: 争う言葉 刻を焦がす
subtitles.english: Conflicting words scorch through time

subtitles.original: 焔 降り注ぐ空に見惚れて
subtitles.english: Entranced by the sky where flames rain down

subtitles.original: 乱れ咲く紅は Dedication
subtitles.english: The wildly blooming crimson is my dedication

subtitles.original: 数多重なる試練も
subtitles.english: Even through countless overlapping trials

subtitles.original: 引き抜いて見せる
subtitles.english: I will pull through

subtitles.original: I will live to keep on fighting till the dawn
subtitles.english: I will live to keep on fighting till the dawn

subtitles.original: 例えば 先の見えない
subtitles.english: For instance, if I strayed into

subtitles.original: 零の境界 迷い込んだとしても
subtitles.english: The border of zero where the future is unseen

subtitles.original: 何度も 繰り返される
subtitles.english: A solitude ending

subtitles.original: 孤高の終焉 そこに残した反戦
subtitles.english: Repeated over and over, leaving resistance behind

subtitles.original: Don't break, I will never give up
subtitles.english: Don't break, I will never give up

subtitles.original: Don't break, 羽が朽ちても
subtitles.english: Don't break, even if my wings decay

subtitles.original: 消せない強さは 時の標
subtitles.english: An indelible strength is the sign of time

subtitles.original: 灰が舞い上がる大地 響かせ
subtitles.english: Letting it resound on the earth where ash dances

subtitles.original: 燃ゆる黎明の中 目を覚ます
subtitles.english: I wake up in the burning dawn

subtitles.original: 刃 交わる切っ先
subtitles.english: The sword tips that cross

subtitles.original: 交わした契りは
subtitles.english: And the vows we exchanged

subtitles.original: Rise and true, come to light at break of day
subtitles.english: Rise and true, come to light at break of day

subtitles.original: I've been trying to find my destiny
subtitles.english: I've been trying to find my destiny

subtitles.original: But they keep pushing and pulling me astray
subtitles.english: But they keep pushing and pulling me astray

subtitles.original: If I go wrong, what awaits me in the dark?
subtitles.english: If I go wrong, what awaits me in the dark?

subtitles.original: Could you tell me please where I need to go?
subtitles.english: Could you tell me please where I need to go?

subtitles.original: Tell me, I can hear it clearly
subtitles.english: Tell me, I can hear it clearly

subtitles.original: Tell me, 声が聞こえる
subtitles.english: Tell me, I hear your voice

subtitles.original: 漲る決意は 影を晴らす
subtitles.english: An overflowing determination clears the shadows

subtitles.original: 焔 降り注ぐ空に見惚れて
subtitles.english: Entranced by the sky where flames rain down

subtitles.original: 乱れ咲く紅は Dedication
subtitles.english: The wildly blooming crimson is my dedication

subtitles.original: 数多重なる試練も
subtitles.english: Even through countless overlapping trials

subtitles.original: 引き抜いて見せる
subtitles.english: I will survive

subtitles.original: Raising flames, show me the path to luminous
subtitles.english: Raising flames, show me the path to luminous

subtitles.original: And in the next life too, I promise I will find you
subtitles.english: And in the next life too, I promise I will find you

subtitles.original: Yay! How was that?
subtitles.english: Yay! How was that?

subtitles.original: Yeah, we just, for the first time ever, performed 'Fever Night' and 'HINOTORI'.
subtitles.english: Yeah, we just, for the first time ever, performed 'Fever Night' and 'HINOTORI'.

subtitles.original: Yeah, the classic 'HINOTORI'. I bet you all wanted to see it once again.
subtitles.english: Yeah, the classic 'HINOTORI'. I bet you all wanted to see it once again.

subtitles.original: But 'Fever Night' is new, very new. My newest single.
subtitles.english: But 'Fever Night' is new, very new. My newest single.

subtitles.original: So I hope you're listening to it a lot. Are you?
subtitles.english: So I hope you're listening to it a lot. Are you?

subtitles.original: Of course. Please be always streaming Kiara's songs.
subtitles.english: Of course. Please be always streaming Kiara's songs.

subtitles.original: Thank you very much for your support.
subtitles.english: Thank you very much for your support.

subtitles.original: So, you thought I was done with call-ins, huh?
subtitles.english: So, you thought I was done with call-ins, huh?

subtitles.original: No, no, no, no, no. There's more.
subtitles.english: No, no, no, no, no. There's more.

subtitles.original: There's more, there's more, there's more.
subtitles.english: There's more, there's more, there's more.
